sfrfile.header:
Version: @(#)regtc1100.xml 1.14 09/11/24 Generated from @(#)regtc1100.xml 1.14 09/11/24
This file contains all SFR and BIT names and on-chip register definitions It is based on the following document(s): - TC1100_dave_20041027.txt
Copyright 2002-2010 Altium BV
